quotes: Think of yourself as dead. you have lived your life. Now, take what's left, and live it properly.
By going within. Nowhere you can go is more peaceful - more free of interruptions - than your own soul.
You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts; therefore guard accordingly.
Do not try to be on the side of the majority, but live according to your inner laws.
